name: FHC-ITP-021 - Type B Fill Placement Rev3
template name: FHC-ITP-021 - Type B Fill Placement Rev3

name: 1.1 The current revision drawings/documents are being used including subcontractors copy.
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Current revision drawing/documents are being used including the subcontractors copy.
REFERENCE DOCUMENTS: Drawings and drawing registers
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP Signed Off
1.2 Implementation of all measures and controls
FREQUENCY: Prior to Placement/ Each Lot
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: All necessary measures and controls are being implemented, that is: OHSCP, PHSCP, PCMP, EMP, ECP, CEMP, ERA, QMP, CHMP, SWMS
REFERENCE DOCUMENTS: OHSCP, PHSCP, PCMP, EMP, ECP, CEMP, ERA, QMP, CHMP, SWMS, WP001.02
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP Signed Off
FREQUENCY: Prior to Placement/ Each Lot

ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Type B material shall have a minimum Assigned CBR of 2%, and Assigned Percent Swell less than 2.5% which has been determined in accordance with VicRoads Code of Practice RC 500.20.
• Materials that exhibit swells greater than or equal to 2.5% shall be classified as expansive and shall only be used as Type B material if approved by the Superintendent.
• Material within the top 400 mm of top of Type B material shall have a swell less than 2.5%. Materials that exhibit swells of 5% or greater are not permitted.
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: Test Record (If silt is observed)
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: An excavation permit must be issued prior to any excavation commencing including removal of unsuitable material.
• Plant and equipment shall be appropriate for the task. Excavation operations shall not disturb areas outside the limit of excavation
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP Signed Off

ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Survey activities undertaken to ensure and validate that all works meet level and location requirements. The establishment and integrity of the survey network shall be verified before commencing any survey and setout activity. IFC and latest available revision used
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: Survey records & pegs on the ground
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: The Contractor shall not commence placing any fill on the prepared areas until the area has been reviewed by the Superintendent.
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP Signed Off
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Placement surface textured to ensure layers keyed into each other.
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP Signed Off
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Layers placed and spread in uniform compacted layers not thicker than 200mm.
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP Signed Off
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Lot size for testing is to be one day's production or 10,000m2, whichever is lesser.
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP Signed Off
FREQUENCY: Prior to Placement/ Each Lot
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Type B material shall be placed in locations shown on the drawings, or if surplus Type B material is available, it may be used in locations specified for Type C material.

• The highest quality Type B materials available shall be reserved for placement in the higher levels of Type B fills being constructed. Type B material shall be spread and compacted in layers not exceeding a compacted thickness of 200 mm.
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP Signed Off
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Proof rolls to be conducted in accordance with Section 173 of the VicRoads Standard Specification
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP Signed Off

ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Initial Testing requirements shall satisfy the full requirements as detailed in the specification. Once three consecutive lots have achieved specified requirement, Superintendent can agree to reduce frequency of testing of subsequent lots to the reduced testing frequency specified in Table 204.141. Reduced frequency resets if one lot fails.
FREQUENCY: First lot then every Second thereafter
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Type B compaction required for Scale B is 98% Characteristic Value of Density Ratio
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: Compaction Test Records
FREQUENCY: 1 lot test to determine assigned CBR and Swell
REFERENCE DOCUMENTS: VicRoads Spec. Cl. 204.14(a)(i), Table 204.141, Table 204.041
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: CBR/Swell Test Records
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: The number of measurements and the tolerances of the mean and standard deviation from the theoretical surface level must comply with Table 204.031
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: Survey report, Lot Register
The signature below verifies that this ITP has been completed in accordance with the FH’s Quality system Procedures and verifies lot compliance with specifications.
